about.summary: Terminal output styling with intuitive and clean API that does not monkey patch String class.

script: gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies pastel-0.7.3.gem && gem unpack pastel-0.7.3.gem
gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies pastel-0.7.3.gem && gem unpack pastel-0.7.3.gem
gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies pastel-0.7.3.gem && gem unpack pastel-0.7.3.gem

name: rb-pastel
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pastel" %}
{% set version = "0.7.3" %}

package:
  name: rb-{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://rubygems.org/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  sha256: f577708463313119d2f7303eefb24217879d188e94f2eea8a19373fdcee48354

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  script:
    - gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
      && gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win }}

requirements:
  host:
    - ruby
  run:
    - ruby
    - rb-equatable >=0.6,<1
    - rb-tty-color >=0.5,<1

test:
  commands:
    - ruby -r {{ name }} -e 'exit 0'

about:
  home: https://rubygems.org/gems/{{ name }}
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: {{ name }}-{{ version }}/LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Terminal output styling with intuitive and clean API that does not monkey patch String class.'
  doc_url: https://www.rubydoc.info/gems/{{ name }}
  dev_url: https://github.com/piotrmurach/pastel

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
    - rluria14
    - adbeda
